briefTitle: An Extension Trial to Assess the Safety of Re-dosing of Iron Isomaltoside/Ferric Derisomaltose (Monofer®/Monoferric®)
officialTitle: An Open-label, Multicentre, Extension Trial to Assess the Safety of Re-dosing of Intravenous Iron Isomaltoside/Ferric Derisomaltose (Monofer®/Monoferric®)
summary: Evaluate safety and efficacy of intravenous (IV) iron isomaltoside/ferric derisomaltose re-dosing, in subjects who were previously treated with iron isomaltoside/ferric derisomaltose.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Subjects With Adverse Drug Reactions (ADR)
